mapper.select: select CD_CODE value, CD_NAME text from SYS_CODE a where CD_G_CODE = #{map.group} order by cd_ordr

select ROLE_ID value, ROLE_NAME text from SYS_ROLE a where 1=1
AND ( UPPER(A.ROLE_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{map.q }) || '%' OR UPPER(A.ROLE_NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{map.q }) || '%' )
order by ROLE_NAME
